thread.title: Gordon Ramsay Has Spent The Entire Weekend Roasting People’s Food On Twitter
thread.title_full: Gordon Ramsay Has Spent The Entire Weekend Roasting People’s Food On Twitter

author: Scott Bryan
title: Gordon Ramsay Has Spent The Entire Weekend Roasting People’s Food On Twitter
text:
View this image ›
Twitter: @gordonramsay ID: 10562148 Now hundreds and hundreds of people are sending him their meals for him to review. @GordonRamsay how did I do?
— Tyler Little (@flightyler) ID: 10562263 And he is not holding back his reviews at all. View this image ›
Twitter: @GordonRamsay ID: 10562132 During the weekend he wouldn’t stop tweeting snarky reviews of people’s food. He was a machine. ID: 10562074 1. Here’s his review of someone’s noodle soup. View this image ›
Twitter: @GordonRamsay ID: 10562016 2. And this fish and chips (with beans) combo. View this image ›
Twitter: @GordonRamsay / Via Twitter: @J_Kilburn ID: 10562123 3. And this delightful dish with rice on the side. View this image ›
Twitter: @GordonRamsay / Via Twitter: @JohnAmos18 ID: 10562063 4. He was a big fan of this omelette. View this image ›
Twitter: @GordonRamsay / Via Twitter: @Lpfreakkk ID: 10562077 5. And this £1.46 masterpiece. View this image ›
Twitter: @GordonRamsay / Via Twitter: @PerkinHarvey ID: 10562056 6. He provided handy tips. View this image ›
Twitter: @GordonRamsay / Via Twitter: @QtCats ID: 10562115 7. He even provided religious advice. View this image ›
Twitter: @GordonRamsay / Via Twitter: @Monaco_Elijah ID: 10562121 8. He wasn’t all that critical. View this image ›
Twitter: @GordonRamsay / Via Twitter: @hunterburnsred ID: 10562163 9. He even commented on some plates. View this image ›
Twitter: @GordonRamsay / Via Twitter: @ramdom01 ID: 10562093 10. He reviewed a lot of breakfasts. View this image ›
Twitter: @GordonRamsay / Via Twitter: @SmithSideBoys ID: 10562013 11. He was rather choosy. View this image ›
Twitter: @GordonRamsay / Via Twitter: @nowincolour ID: 10562097 12. Particularly, scrambled eggs. View this image ›
Twitter: @GordonRamsay / Via Twitter: @Drekkas6 ID: 10562003 13. You get it now… he was pretty harsh. View this image ›
Twitter: @GordonRamsay / Via Twitter: @TheBingoMama ID: 10562032 14. He didn’t know what a roast dinner was. View this image ›
Twitter: @GordonRamsay / Via Twitter: @Samuellee1989 ID: 10562051 15. This grandmother wasn’t even spared. View this image ›
Twitter: @GordonRamsay / Via Twitter: @Nitro4Runner ID: 10562061 16. Nobody was saved. View this image ›
Twitter: @GordonRamsay / Via Twitter: @cheesemeupdaddy ID: 10562552 17. Bless you Gordon Ramsay. View this image ›
Twitter: @GordonRamsay ID: 10562126 18. Bless you. View this image ›
Twitter: @GordonRamsay / Via Twitter: @kingdickaprio ID: 10562110 Follow his latest reviews at @GordonRamsay . ID: 10562348 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
Scott Bryan is a TV editor for BuzzFeed and is based in London. Contact this reporter at: scott.bryan@buzzfeed.com
